HOME-COOKING AND D.I.Y. COCKTAIL KITS DELIVERY SERVICES
Let’s have some cooking fun at home! Marco Polo Hotels – Hong Kong has put together a series of Home-cooking and D.I.Y. Cocktail Kits, allowing guests to enjoy simple, delicious dishes and drinks in the comfort of their own homes without hassle.
Kindly order 3 days in advance.
Cucina
Cucina’s Italian Home-cooking Kits include appetisers, mains and desserts. Every kit comes with the ingredients, together with video demonstrations and secret tips from Chef de Cuisine Andrea Delzanno. Highlights include Crab Meat Salad with Caviar, Fettuccine Bolognese and Veal Milanese.
Level 6, Marco Polo Hongkong Hotel
T / WhatsApp  +852 2113 0808
 
Be on Canton
D.I.Y. Cocktail Kits feature 10 popular cocktails including Sex on the Beach, Old Fashioned and Negroni. Guests can follow the videos and craft timeless classic cocktails at home. A cocktail shaker is included upon spending HK$500 or above.
Level 3, Gateway Hotel
T +852 2113 7828
WhatsApp  +852 5217 6428
Cucina
